articles.author: Abid Rahman, Patrick Brzeski
articles.title: Kanye “Ye” West Struggles Through Chaotic, Rain-Soaked Shanghai Concert - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Attendees at the July 12 gig at the Shanghai Stadium were chanting for a refund after Ye appeared over 40 minutes late and the event was mired in technical problems and poor weather.
articles.content: Kanye “Ye” West’s return to live performance is off to a rocky start. The errant rapper, producer and mogul’s concert in Shanghai on Friday night was beset by technical problems, terrible weather and… [+3935 chars]
